Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • daos.DAO
      • daos.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends DAO
    The UserDAO class provides access to the user table in the database.
    Version:
    1.5 05 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Brian Goh

        public boolean addUser(User user,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Adds a user to the database and create default 5 plots
        Parameters:
        user - user to add
        password - password of user
        Returns:
        true upon successful addition, false otherwise

      • authenticate

        public User authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String inputtedPassword)
        Checks if a user's input username and password matches database
        Parameters:
        username - username of user attempting to log in
        inputtedPassword - inputted password of user attempting to log in
        Returns:
        authenticated user if successful, null otherwise

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a user with the specified username
        Parameters:
        username - username of user to retrieve
        Returns:
        user of specified username, null if not found

        Returns:
